src:
Hasil Lengkap dan Klasemen Pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/2020
04 Nov 2019, 08:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Hasil dan klasemen pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/2020. Pada pekan ke-11, Liverpool meraih kemenangan secara dramatis atas Aston Villa. The Reds menang dengan skor 1-2 lewat gol yang terjadi pada menit-menit akhir pertandingan.
Bertandang ke Villa Park, Liverpool lebih dulu tertinggal dari aksi Trezeguet pada menit ke-21. Pasukan Jurgen Klopp baru membalas di menit ke-87. Liverpool memastikan tiga poin setelah Sadio Mane mencetak gol pada tambahan waktu.
Kemenangan dengan skor 2-1 juga diraih Manchester City. Menjamu Southampton, Man City dibuat kesulitan. Man City kebobolan pada menit ke-13 lewat James Ward-Prowse, lalu kemudian membalas di babak kedua dari aksi Sergio Aguero dan Kyle Walker.
Kemenangan dengan skor identik juga diraih Chelsea. Bermain di Vicarage Road, Chelse dibuat kesulitan tuan rumah Watford. Chelsea akhirnya menang 2-1 setelah mendapat sumbangan Tammy Abraham dan Christian Pulisic.
text:
Complete results and Standings for Week 11 of the Premier League 2019/2020
Nov 04 2019, 08:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - 2019/2020 Premier League results and standings. In Week 11, Liverpool won a dramatic victory over Aston Villa. The Reds win with a score of 1-2 through goals that occur in the final minutes of the match.
Come to Villa Park, Liverpool first left behind from Trezeguet action in the 21st minute. Jurgen Klopp's troops responded in the 87th minute. Liverpool made sure of three points after Sadio Mane scored in extra time.
A 2-1 victory was also won by Manchester City. Entertaining Southampton, Man City made difficulties. Man City conceded in the 13th minute through James Ward-Prowse, then retaliated in the second half from the actions of Sergio Aguero and Kyle Walker.
The victory with an identical score also won by Chelsea. Playing on Vicarage Road, Chelse made it difficult for host Watford. Chelsea finally won 2-1 after receiving donations from Tammy Abraham and Christian Pulisic.
